name: tomwalder/polyfill-appengine-google-cloud-tasks
description: Allow simple usages of the old Google App Engine native PushTask and PushQueue to work on Cloud Run, other environments using the Google Cloud Tasks API

suggest.ext-grpc: Enables use of gRPC, a universal high-performance RPC framework created by Google.
suggest.ext-protobuf: Provides a significant increase in throughput over the pure PHP protobuf implementation. See https://cloud.google.com/php/grpc for installation instructions.
